name: Klutter Inc
description: Developer of a goods comparison platform designed to find out discount deals and offers on consumer durables. The company's platform offers complete transparency by instantly showing shopping options across all retail marketplaces including new, used, refurbished, rental, unbranded and in-store, enabling consumers to compare prices, shop across marketplaces, and maximize savings by making better buying decisions.
one_liner: Developer of a goods comparison platform designed to find out discount deals and offers on consumer durables. The company's platform offers complete transparency by instantly showing shopping options across all retail marketplaces including new, used, refurbished, rental, unbranded and in-store, enabling consumers to compare prices, shop across marketplaces, and maximize savings by making better buying decisions.

name: Prynt Corp.
description: Provider of printers for smartphone camera cases designed to print any photo instantly. The company's printers are compatible with iOS and Android phones and pictures have short video clips embedded inside, enabling users to share their memories in a way that is tangible and magical.
one_liner: Provider of printers for smartphone camera cases designed to print any photo instantly. The company's printers are compatible with iOS and Android phones and pictures have short video clips embedded inside, enabling users to share their memories in a way that is tangible and magical.

name: PUBLY Inc
description: Developer of an online content platform designed to offer content subscription services for working people. The company's platform creates, designs, archives, stores and publishes custom content and events that can be paid for and reserved for future reference, enabling users to buy and publish content from a variety of media sources that are yet to be released.
one_liner: Developer of an online content platform designed to offer content subscription services for working people. The company's platform creates, designs, archives, stores and publishes custom content and events that can be paid for and reserved for future reference, enabling users to buy and publish content from a variety of media sources that are yet to be released.

name: Raseedi LLC
description: Developer of a fintech application designed to help consumers save telecom credit. The company's application uses a smart algorithm to cross-match user consumption with the suitable packages on both lines and automates calls from the cheap SIM for each call, helping users with food and medical savings by offering coupons, promo codes, discounts, and budget limits, and enabling users to save money.
one_liner: Developer of a fintech application designed to help consumers save telecom credit. The company's application uses a smart algorithm to cross-match user consumption with the suitable packages on both lines and automates calls from the cheap SIM for each call, helping users with food and medical savings by offering coupons, promo codes, discounts, and budget limits, and enabling users to save money.

name: Reality Reflection Inc.
description: Developer of a virtual reality software designed to build lifelike 3D models in a detailed resolution. The company's software provides immersion and reality with a level of full high-definition to create virtual reality games, photo-realistic characters, high-fidelity facial animations, and interactive content for its clients, enabling gaming companies to use it in various computer games and multimedia products.
one_liner: Developer of a virtual reality software designed to build lifelike 3D models in a detailed resolution. The company's software provides immersion and reality with a level of full high-definition to create virtual reality games, photo-realistic characters, high-fidelity facial animations, and interactive content for its clients, enabling gaming companies to use it in various computer games and multimedia products.

name: Sarwa Digital Wealth Limited
description: Developer of an automated investment management platform designed to offer a way to invest money for long-term financial growth. The company's platform combines proven investment strategies with technology that drives down costs and educates the public about the different aspects of personal finance and investment, enabling customers to make diversified investments and get better returns.
one_liner: Developer of an automated investment management platform designed to offer a way to invest money for long-term financial growth. The company's platform combines proven investment strategies with technology that drives down costs and educates the public about the different aspects of personal finance and investment, enabling customers to make diversified investments and get better returns.

name: Applied Life Private
description: Developer of a women's community platform designed to offer support, resources, opportunities, and interactions, discuss health, career, relationships, get work-from-home jobs, and more. The company's platform offers a diverse range of engagement formats to women, including corporate jobs, returning professionals programs, partner programs, part-time work, freelancing, and franchising, enabling women to find mentorship and career content while also helping them with personal advice via growth channels of community, content, champions, conversations, commerce, and companies.
one_liner: Developer of a women's community platform designed to offer support, resources, opportunities, and interactions, discuss health, career, relationships, get work-from-home jobs, and more. The company's platform offers a diverse range of engagement formats to women, including corporate jobs, returning professionals programs, partner programs, part-time work, freelancing, and franchising, enabling women to find mentorship and career content while also helping them with personal advice via growth channels of community, content, champions, conversations, commerce, and companies.

name: Smart Crowd Ltd
description: Operator of a real estate crowdfunding platform intended to make real estate investment accessible. The company's platform provides the opportunity to buy and sell fractional shares in properties and reduces the barriers to entry to build financial and real estate assets and generate investment income, enabling low and middle-income individuals to actively manage their shares and make informed decisions while investing in real estate projects.
one_liner: Operator of a real estate crowdfunding platform intended to make real estate investment accessible. The company's platform provides the opportunity to buy and sell fractional shares in properties and reduces the barriers to entry to build financial and real estate assets and generate investment income, enabling low and middle-income individuals to actively manage their shares and make informed decisions while investing in real estate projects.

name: Sorock, Inc.
description: Sorock is a webtoon production company attempting to realize 'one source multi-use' of IP by collaborating with both webtoon and drama writers from the initial stages of webtoon production, ensuring that the IP is suitable for both webtoon and visual content. Additionally, the company aims to target not only the domestic market but also the Japanese market from the early stages.
one_liner: Sorock is a webtoon production company attempting to realize 'one source multi-use' of IP by collaborating with both webtoon and drama writers from the initial stages of webtoon production, ensuring that the IP is suitable for both webtoon and visual content. Additionally, the company aims to target not only the domestic market but also the Japanese market from the early stages.

name: Speero Limited
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended to provide automotive spare parts. The company's marketplace covers used and new parts in one single platform with direct integrations with repair shops, insurance companies, and other businesses and also allows users to compare price quotes from suppliers and make an order through the platform or app, enabling users to get automotive parts at low cost and clients to reduce their cost, increase efficiency, eliminate fraud, and discover new opportunities while running their businesses.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended to provide automotive spare parts. The company's marketplace covers used and new parts in one single platform with direct integrations with repair shops, insurance companies, and other businesses and also allows users to compare price quotes from suppliers and make an order through the platform or app, enabling users to get automotive parts at low cost and clients to reduce their cost, increase efficiency, eliminate fraud, and discover new opportunities while running their businesses.

name: Storicity Inc.
description: Developer of a travel planning platform designed to recommend popular tourist destinations. The company's platform creates mobile audio guides through its artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot that offers information about artifacts, and monuments while also providing assistance with a travel itinerary, enabling domestic and inbound individuals to plan their vacations in an efficient manner.
one_liner: Developer of a travel planning platform designed to recommend popular tourist destinations. The company's platform creates mobile audio guides through its artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot that offers information about artifacts, and monuments while also providing assistance with a travel itinerary, enabling domestic and inbound individuals to plan their vacations in an efficient manner.

name: Sweater Holding Ltd
description: Developer of booking platform intended to provide car washing services. The company allows users to book appointments through its application and provides easy and convenient services, helping customers to get the car washing service at the right time and place at a competitive price.
one_liner: Developer of booking platform intended to provide car washing services. The company allows users to book appointments through its application and provides easy and convenient services, helping customers to get the car washing service at the right time and place at a competitive price.

name: Synervoz Communications Inc.
description: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.

industry: AI/Machine Learning, AudioTech, Developer Tools, Gaming, No Code, Telecommunications, Deep Tech, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Entertainment / Media, Consumer, Network Effects

name: Taker, Inc
description: Developer of an online ordering platform designed to facilitate food ordering and restaurant management. The company's platform leverages technology which is used to expand digitally to adapt to customers' changing behavior and service expectations by seamlessly receiving the orders to prepare for pickup or delivery, enabling restaurants of all sizes to engage better with customers and improve their sales.
one_liner: Developer of an online ordering platform designed to facilitate food ordering and restaurant management. The company's platform leverages technology which is used to expand digitally to adapt to customers' changing behavior and service expectations by seamlessly receiving the orders to prepare for pickup or delivery, enabling restaurants of all sizes to engage better with customers and improve their sales.

name: The Clozet Company Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an online renting platform designed to offer high-end luxury bags and clothes. The company's platform offers bags, clutches, dresses, skirts, and other women's accessories for a short time, enabling customers to try new fashion on different occasions without paying the full price for it.

name: Theres Inc
description: Operator of an outdoor community and commerce platform intended to provide outdoor information. The company provides information tailored to the level of customers at each stage and compares outdoor products that can be purchased through the sales channel, thus providing outdoor enthusiasts with relevant information.

name: TICKR HOLDINGS, INC.
description: Operator of a reverse marketplace intended to buy and resell live event tickets. The company's platform offers buyers to create bids on events by choosing their preferred seating location and naming their offer price, enabling sellers to accept a matching bid and resell their tickets instantly.
one_liner: Operator of a reverse marketplace intended to buy and resell live event tickets. The company's platform offers buyers to create bids on events by choosing their preferred seating location and naming their offer price, enabling sellers to accept a matching bid and resell their tickets instantly.

name: Clickgaming Distribution Group Sdn. Bhd.
description: Manufacturer of gaming chairs and accessories intended to provide long hours of comfort for greater productivity and performance. The company offers ergonomic gaming chairs as well as smart desks, cable organizers, cushions, casters, and many more, enabling gamers to play and enjoy games comfortably.

name: Veluga Brewery Inc.
description: Provider of beverage subscription services intended to serve handcrafted beer. The company's services include craft beer curation and subscription where members are delivered a themed box of hand-selected craft beers and food pairings every month, enabling members to enjoy their beverage drinks.

name: Debit Circles Sdn. Bhd.
description: Developer of a financial application designed to provide cashless transactions. The company's platform offers a cashless system to parents to approve instant allowances, create savings habits, and encourage responsibility through chores and tasks, enabling kids to learn and experience money safely.

description: Operator of financial education wellbeing platform designed for employees in the Middle East. description: Developer of a visual communication platform designed to interact in a fresh and fun way. name: LATAM FINANCIAL SERVICES, INC.
description: Developer of a mortgage purchase software designed to provide financial advisory services for mortgage debts. The company's software provides a form for basic information about the current mortgage credit, helps in finding good bidders with the financial institution to close the terms of the transfer of the mortgage, enabling users to avail mortgage debt purchase without any hassle.

name: Between Two Ferns Inc.
description: Provider of website that connects people with financial advisors. The company connects advisers with advice seekers for one on one calls.
one_liner: Provider of website that connects people with financial advisors. The company connects advisers with advice seekers for one on one calls.

name: Caffeinated Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an online coffee delivery platform designed to offer coffee of different blends to their customers. The company's platform offers a subscription based interface, as well as delivers the pack of coffee at a person's doorstep, enabling customers to taste dozens of coffees from different parts of the country.
